title: Hanes Men's Essentials Long Sleeve T-Shirt Pack, Crewneck Cotton Tees, 4-Pack
description: ESSENTIAL QUALITY, ESSENTIAL STYLE - Outstanding quality and value you have come to expect from Hanes.
MIDWEIGHT COTTON - 100% cotton midweight fabric makes this a shirt you can wear all year long. Light steel is a cotton/polyester blend.
VERSATILE CREWNECK - A classic design, this men’s long-sleeve tee is accented with a crew neckline and double-needle stitching.
CHASE THE CHILL - This men's t-shirt takes the chill off as a top layer and is made for layering when the temperatures drop.
VALUE YOU LOVE - Hanes long-sleeve T-shirt is available in a convenient 4-pack, giving you even more everyday options.
COLD WATER WASH - Hanes recommends machine washing this men's t-shirt in cold water to help reduce energy consumption.

Hanes Essentials long sleeve t-shirts for men are crafted for quality and designed for comfort. Made from 100% cotton, this men’s t-shirt features ribbing at the cuffs and collar for that timeless crewneck tee style you love. Sturdy details like double-needle stitching and shoulder-to-shoulder taping make this long sleeve tee a wardrobe essential you can depend upon. Available in a handy 4-pack, it's perfect to pair with jeans, shorts, or your best Hanes joggers. Wear it as a bottom layer or as your only layer. You can't go wrong with our cotton classics.
